duties_responsibilities.duty: Test DWDM system hardware and verify compliance with data and telecom standards.
Plan and execute tests for DWDM transmission, configure, and maintain lab test systems.
Document test results and validate the features on Optical Transponders.
Develop and automate scripts for features in every release.
Generate test plans and execution in a timely manner, working with Systems engineers, software engineers, and Hardware engineers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science (Master's preferred)
